title: An improved interface for tutorial dialogues: browsing a visual dialogue history
proctitle: CHI '94: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Benoît Lemaire
authors.institution: University of Pittsburgh, Learning Research and Development Center, 3939 O'Hara Street, Pittsburgh, PA
